title: Plugin directory in IDA?
content:
According to IDA docs, we can put a Python plugin into $HOME/.idapro/plugins/ directory. But when I copied my Python plugin there & restart IDA, IDA still do not see that.

What can go wrong, and how can I debug this issue?

Thanks.

comments.text: Are you using Ubuntu/Debian? Whats the name of the plugin? Did you check the plugins.cfg?
It is my own plugin, written in Python. Do I need to modify plugins.cfg to get it loaded? Hmm I dont think so.

I believe problem may be within your plugin or directory is wrong. Try to get any other python plugins available on hex-rays hex-rays.com/products/ida/support/download.shtml and put it in the same directory. Check if IDA is able to see it after restart. Of so - your plugin is not formatted well. If not - possibly this is a wrong folder.
